content: to end row 7 k4 picking up & knitting each wrap together with its corresponding stitch row 8 k to end row 9 k3 p1 ssk turn when working the ssk you will be slipping the last st of the border with the next st from the body of the shawl row 10 sl1 k4 repeat row 7 & 8 until 9 sts remain on the needles then work as follows row 1 rs k3 s2 k1 psso k3 row 2 ws k7 row 3 k2 s2 k1 psso k2 row 4 k5 row 5 k1 s2 k1 psso k1 row 6 k3 row 7 s2 k1 psso cut yarn and pull through loop to fasten saxon braid chart saxon braid written directions row 1 k3 m1l k3 7 sts row 2 k3 p1 k3 row 3 k3 p1 m1l k3 8 sts row 4 k3 p1 k4 row 5 k3 p1 s1 m1l k3 9 sts row 6 k3 p2 k4 row 7 k3 p1 s1 p1 m1l k3 10 sts row 8 k2 k1 p1 twice k4 row 9 k3 p1 s1 p2 m1l k3 11 sts row 10 k1 k2 p1 twice k4 row 11 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo m1l k3 12 sts row 12 k3 p1 p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 13 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo p2tog m1l k3 13 sts row 14 k3 p1 yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 15 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo p2tog p1 m1l k3 14 sts row 16 k3 p1 k1 yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 17 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo p2tog p2 m1l k3 15 sts row 18 k3 p1 k2 yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 19 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo p2tog p3 m1l k3 16 sts row 20 k3 p1 k3 yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 21 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo p2tog p2 k2 m1l k3 17 sts row 22 k3 p3 k2 yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 23 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo p2tog p2 k2 p1 m1l k3 18 sts row 24 k2 k1 p1 twice p1 k2 yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 25 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo p2tog p2 k2 p2 m1l k3 19 sts row 26 k1 k2 p1 twice p1 k2 yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 27 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo p2tog p2 k2 p2 k1 m1l k3 20 sts row 28 k3 p1 twice p1 k2 yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 29 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo p2tog p2 2/1 lpc p3 m1l k3 21 sts row 30 k3 p1 twice p1 k3 yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 31 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo p2tog p3 2/1 lpc k3 m1l k3 22 sts row 32 k3 p1 k1 p4 k4 yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 33 k3 p1 s1 p2 yo p2tog p4 2/2 rc p2 m1l k3 23 sts row 34 k3 p1 k2 p4 k4 yo p2tog k2 p1 k4 row 35 k3
